description: Updates phone number details, such as product type or calling name, for the specified phone number ID. You can update one phone number detail at a time. For example, you can update either the product type or the calling name in one action. For toll-free numbers, you cannot use the Amazon Chime Business Calling product type. For numbers outside the U.S., you must use the Amazon Chime SIP Media Application Dial-In product type. Updates to outbound calling names can take 72 hours to complete. Pending updates to outbound calling names must be complete before you can request another update.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The updated phone number details.

nested_items.name: PhoneNumberId
nested_items.description: The phone number ID.

nested_items.name: E164PhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number, in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: The phone number country. Format: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The phone number type.

nested_items.name: ProductType
nested_items.description: The phone number product type.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The phone number status.

nested_items.name: Capabilities
nested_items.description: The phone number capabilities.

nested_items.name: InboundCall
nested_items.description: Allows or denies inbound calling for the specified phone number.

nested_items.name: OutboundCall
nested_items.description: Allows or denies outbound calling for the specified phone number.

nested_items.name: InboundSMS
nested_items.description: Allows or denies inbound SMS messaging for the specified phone number.

nested_items.name: OutboundSMS
nested_items.description: Allows or denies outbound SMS messaging for the specified phone number.

nested_items.name: InboundMMS
nested_items.description: Allows or denies inbound MMS messaging for the specified phone number.

nested_items.name: OutboundMMS
nested_items.description: Allows or denies outbound MMS messaging for the specified phone number.

nested_items.name: Associations
nested_items.description: The phone number associations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Contains the ID for the entity specified in Name.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Defines the association with an Amazon Chime account ID, user ID, Amazon Chime Voice Connector ID, or Amazon Chime Voice Connector group ID.

nested_items.name: AssociatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the phone number association, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: CallingName
nested_items.description: The outbound calling name associated with the phone number.

nested_items.name: CallingNameStatus
nested_items.description: The outbound calling name status.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The phone number creation timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The updated phone number timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.

nested_items.name: DeletionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The deleted phone number timestamp, in ISO 8601 format.
